channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot holes, 11th April
item.description:
We appreciate that the pot holes have been done but within weeks they are starting to come back and the road is very uneven and causing damage to vehicles it's no use filling in this section of road it needs resurfacing it's just a wast of time and money filling the potholes in
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Lane, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree overhanging property, risk of falling on property, damage to vehicles and people. Also, signs of roots damaging boundary wall, cracks and roots effecting drains. Trees are now touching the roof of the property., 10th April
item.description:

item.title: '40mph limit' reminder sign on A40 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham near jctn with Lansdown Walk twisted on post, no longer visible to traffic., 10th April
item.description:
North side of A40 Lansdown Road, Lansdown, Cheltenham â€“ grass verge in front of 11 & 12 Lansdown Place, 30 yds east of its junction of A40 with Lansdown Walk. What3Words location = woke.shower.stay. Number on post = 118160. '40mph limit' reminder sign on a post with 'GIVE WAY / 100 yds' sign on top (see photos). The 'Give Way' sign is unaffected but the 40mph sign has been twisted on its post around 90 degrees by vandals. As a result it's facing the opposite footpath and isn't visible to road traffic. The blue round sign for cyclists immediately above it has also been twisted slightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3x potholes - never repaired properly., 10th April
item.description:
